Description:
On behalf of the fastest-growing retail company across the Middle East, we are looking for an ambitious and results-oriented  Digital Visual Merchandising Manager. Option to be based in Riyadh or Kuwait.As a Digital Visual Merchandising Manager, you will play a crucial role in shaping our client's online presence and maximizing the visual appeal of our products and services. Your primary responsibility will be to create visually engaging digital displays, optimize user experiences, and enhance our online branding efforts. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, design, and e-commerce, to drive sales, improve customer engagement, and promote brand consistency across digital platforms.Key ResponsibilitiesDigital Merchandising Strategy:Develop and execute a digital visual merchandising strategy to enhance the online shopping experience.
Collaborate with the marketing team to align visual merchandising with promotional campaigns and product launches.
Analyze market trends and competitors to stay updated on best practices.Content Creation and Curation:Create visually appealing digital displays, including product images, banners, and videos, ensuring they align with brand guidelines.
Curate and organize product collections, categories, and landing pages to maximize user engagement.
Optimize visual content for various digital platforms and devices.User Experience Enhancement:Continuously monitor and improve the website's navigation and layout to enhance user experience.
Implement A/B testing and user feedback to make data-driven improvements.
Ensure all digital content is responsive and accessible.Collaboration and Cross-functional Support:Collaborate with design, marketing, and e-commerce teams to ensure consistent branding and messaging across all digital channels.
Work closely with web developers to implement and test new features and functionalities.
Provide training and guidance to team members and stakeholders on visual merchandising best practices. Performance Analysis:Track KPIs related to visual merchandising, such as conversion rates, bounce rates, and click-through rates.
Generate regular reports and insights to inform decision-making.
Recommend and implement improvements based on data analysis.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in marketing, digital media, design, or a related field (Master's degree is a plus).
An ideal candidate will have experience managing the website of a Big Ecom Player
Proven experience in digital visual merchandising, e-commerce, or related roles.
Proficiency in graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite).
Strong understanding of user experience (UX) principles.
Knowledge of web development and content management systems (CMS).
Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
Excellent communication and project management skills.
Creativity and a keen eye for visual design.
Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and dynamic work environment.
Knowledge of SEO and online advertising is a plus.
